author: Jonathan Cheng
title: Winter Olympics Wind Down With Plenty of Razzle-Dazzle
text:
PYEONGCHANG, South Koreaâ€”The Winter Olympics in South Korea wound down much the way they opened: With plenty of high-tech razzle-dazzle and a healthy dose of geopolitical intrigue.
North Korea, and the standoff over its nuclear-weapons programs, loomed large over the Games, hosted in this ski resort just 50 miles south of the demilitarized zone that divides the Korean Peninsula.
